Sameh Alaa bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt. A mụrụ ya na Cairo, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cairo, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara Europe. N'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi Ijipt mbụ gosipụtara ihe nkiri na ngalaba asọmpi Short Film na Cannes Film Festival. Ihe nkiri ahụ, I'm Afraid to Forget Your Face, gara n'ihu merie Short Film Palme d'Or na 2020 Cannes Film Festival, na-aghọ ihe nkiri Egypt mbụ meriri Short Film Palma d'Or
Na June 2021, a kpọrọ aha ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe isii maka Cinéfondation na ngalaba ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na 2021 Cannes Film Festival.
